summary: RGladden123@yahoo.com  -----  Global Talent Acquisition Leader with Fortune 500 organizations (Nike, Dell, Intel, BMC Software) experience in building, managing, and streamlining talent management strategies, programs and teams; while implementing industry “best practices” for corporations across various industries throughout the Americas, EMEA, and APAC.		Industries include: Industrial Design, High tech, Internet, Cloud, Data Center, Semi-conductor and Creative Vision. Business-minded leader and trusted adviser to executives, accomplished in driving creative and innovative sourcing and staffing effectiveness and leading change in highly visible, complex, and fast-paced environments. Proven success in aligning talent acquisition initiatives with business strategy to drive bottom-line success.		Specialties:	-Global Talent Acquisition & Management-Executive Recruiting-Employment Branding -Diversity & Inclusion-University Relations -Workforce Planning-Immigration & Mobility -Develop and Implement effective programs, events, and social media in recruitment strategy	•	-Analytic & Metrics
